name: Buda Castle
description: A castle with panoramic view. An oversight for river Danube and Pest side of city. Also, home to the Hungarian National Gallery and the Budapest History Museum.
approxTime: about half an hour (but not the museums.)

name: Fisherman's Bastion
description: A castle like place giving magnificent views to the parliament building and Danube from its turrets and terraces. Also place to Matthias church.

name: Castle District
description: This is the neighbourhood near Buda castle and fisheman's bastion. Offering beautiful streets with many shops.

name: Budapest Castle Hill Funicular
description: A funicular leading to Buda Castle with very beautiful view for Chain bridge.

name: Hungarian Parliament Building
description: Parliament building, among the biggest parliament building. It is a nice place to visit, not just outsides but also from inside as well. Inside parliament offers grand stairway as well as dome where crown is palced.
timings: open 24 hours (outside XD); 8 am–6 pm (indoor visit)

name: St. Stephen's Basilica
description: A basilica in the heart of Budapest, very photogenic place.
timings: open 24 hours (outside); Tuesday, 9 am–5:45 pm (indoor visit)

name: Budapest Fashion Street
description: A palce with a number of fashion stores, close to Basilica.
timings: open 24 hours; but stores have timings

name: Light Art Museum
description: One of the world's largest museums dedicated to showcase light as a medium of art.

name: Museum of Illusions
description: Museum of Illusions is a visual, sensory, and educational experience designed to engage your sense of wonder and shift your perspective through the science.
timings: (Sun - Thu) 10 am–7 pm; (Fri - Sat) 10 am–8 pm

name: Museum of Sweets and Selfies No.1: Orgin
description: Colorful scenarios designed for self-photography, including fantasy figures & multicolored rooms.

name: INDOOR MiniGolf Budapest
description: The realm of 3D blacklight mini golf awaits you on an 18-hole adventure course in the heart of the city!

name: Szimpla Kert (Budapest ruin bars)
description: Huge pub with old mismatched items & a disused Trabant car, with music, food, market & a garden.
timings: Saturday, 12 pm–4 am; Sunday, 9 am–4 am

name: Metropolitan Ervin Szabó Library (seems like Harry Potter world)
description: This is a very scenic library with a palace looks like Harry Potter world.

name: Citadel (Liberty Queen)
description: This is an iconic statue hovering over the city. The hit top is closed now but the base is yet accessible. Also, the overlook to the city looks very beautiful here.
timings: Temporarily closed; but accessible till the base of the statue
